channel.title: Canvas on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Canvas on Konigi

item.title: Drawscript: Generate vector code from Illustrator
item.description: Drawscript is an extension for Adobe Illustrator that generates graphics code from vector shapes in realtime. Generates OBJ-C, C++, JavaScript for HTML5 Canvas, Processing, Actionscript 3, JSON, and Raw bezier points. http://drawscri.pt/

item.title: Ai to Canvas Plug-In
item.description: The Ai->Canvas plug-in enables Adobe Illustrator to export vector and bitmap artwork directly to an HTML5 canvas element that can be rendered in a canvas-enabled browser. The plug-in provides drawing, animation and coding options such as events so that you can build interactive, well-designed canvas-based web apps. http://visitmix.com/labs/ai2canvas/

item.title: UNIFFY
item.description: The Uniffy is a collaborative project of decoration and customization of spaces, environments and all kinds of objects, which are opportunities to express ideas and ways of harmonizing the house and give personality, elegance and distinction. With Uniffy, you can change the look of any environment, because the combinations and possibilities are endless, and best of all, is that the adhesives are easy and quick to apply. They were specially created for people who like to customize and are in constant search for new forms of self-expression ….
